relationships.relationship_description: Microsoft Teams is part of Office Commercial products and cloud services.
Office 365 Security and Compliance is part of Office Commercial products and cloud services.
Skype for Business is part of Office Commercial products and cloud services.
LinkedIn Talent Solutions is part of LinkedIn revenue.
LinkedIn Marketing Solutions is part of LinkedIn revenue.
LinkedIn Premium Subscriptions is part of LinkedIn revenue.
LinkedIn Sales Solutions is part of LinkedIn revenue.
LinkedIn Learning Solutions is part of LinkedIn revenue.
SQL Server is part of Server products and cloud services.
Windows Server is part of Server products and cloud services.
Visual Studio is part of Server products and cloud services.
System Center is part of Server products and cloud services.
GitHub is part of Server products and cloud services.
Microsoft 365 Commercial includes Office 365 portion of Microsoft 365 Commercial subscriptions.
Microsoft 365 Consumer includes Office 365 portion of Microsoft 365 Commercial subscriptions.
